archive.description:
3:56 PM PST We are investigating increased packet loss impacting VPN connections in the US-EAST-1 region.
5:20 PM PST Between 2:15 PM - 4:09 PM PST, some customers experienced elevated packet loss via VPN and Direct Connect to some VPC instances in the Northern Virginia (US-EAST-1) region. The service is now operating normally.
10:10 PM PST We experienced slow propagation of DNS edits to the Route 53 DNS servers from 8:58 PM PST to 9:59 PM PST. The problem is now resolved.

5:44 AM PST We are investigating elevated Invalidation API error rates, requests for content are being served normally.
7:13 AM PST We experienced increased Invalidation API error rates from 1:19 AM PST until 6:05 AM PST. All API requests are back to normal. Requests for content were served normally throughout.

10:51 AM PST We are currently investigating increased errors for requests to our EU-WEST-1 region.
10:54 AM PST Requests to S3 in the EU-WEST-1 region between 10:37AM PST to 10:41AM PST experienced higher than normal error rates. The issue is now resolved and the service is operating normally.
11:34 AM PST Requests to S3 in the EU-WEST-1 region between 10:37AM PST to 10:41AM PST and 11:18AM PST to 11:22AM PST experienced higher than normal error rates. The issue is now resolved and the service is operating normally.
3:28 PM PST From 2:48PM PST to 2:58PM PST a subset of requests to our AP-Northeast-1 region experienced timeouts when trying to connect. The issue has been resolved.
6:51 PM PST From 2:48PM PST to 2:58PM PST some EC2 instances in our AP-Northeast-1 region experienced problems with network connections to/from clients on the Internet. The issue has been resolved.

3:11 AM PST We are investigating increased errors for requests in the US-West-1 region.
3:29 AM PST From 2:56AM PST to 3:16AM PST requests to the US-WEST-1 region experienced high failure rates. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.

3:26 AM PST We are investigating elevated API errors rates in the US-WEST-1 region.
3:39 AM PST Between 2:57 AM and 3:20 AM PST, EC2 API requests were failing in the US-WEST-1 region. The issue has been corrected and the service is operating normally.

3:41 AM PST We are investigating increased error rates and latencies for CloudWatch APIs and metrics in the US-WEST-1 Region. CloudWatch Alarms may be transitioning into "INSUFFICIENT DATA" state if set on delayed metrics.
3:54 AM PST Between 2:57 AM and 3:20 AM PST, CloudWatch metrics were delayed and CloudWatch APIs requests were failing in the US-WEST-1 region. During this time, CloudWatch data set on delayed metrics transitioned into the INSUFFICIENT_DATA state. The issue has been corrected. Metric data points delayed during this event can now be seen in CloudWatch graphs. CloudWatch alarms and data services are operating normally.
3:45 AM PST Between 2:57 AM and 3:20 AM PST, RDS API requests were experiencing high API error rates in the US-WEST-1 region. The issue has been corrected and the service is operating normally.
4:03 AM PST Between 2:57 AM and 3:20 AM PST, API requests were experiencing high error rates in the US-WEST-1 region. The issue has been corrected and the service is operating normally
4:06 AM PST Between 2:57 AM and 3:20 AM PST, API requests were experiencing high error rates in the US-WEST-1 region. The issue has been corrected and the service is operating normally
4:09 AM PST Between 2:57AM to 3:20 AM PST, there were increased error rates and latencies for customers connecting to Amazon SimpleDBs US-West-1 region. The service is operating normally now.
4:15 AM PST Between 2:57 AM and 3:20 AM PST, ElasticMapReduce API requests were failing in the US-WEST-1 region. The issue has been corrected and the service is operating normally.

4:13 AM PST Between 2:57 AM and 3:20 AM PST, ElastiCache API requests were experiencing high API error rates in the US-WEST-1 region. The issue has been corrected and the service is operating normally.
4:41 AM PST Between 2:57 AM and 3:20 AM PST, API requests were experiencing high error rates in the US-WEST-1 region. The issue has been corrected and the service is operating normally

12:25 PM PST From 11:39AM PST to 12:04PM PST some EC2 instances in our SA-East-1 region experienced problems with network connections to/from clients on the Internet. One of our redundant upstream Internet carriers was seeing elevated packet loss for some clients. We have shifted traffic away from this carrier for now and the issue has been resolved.

archive.summary: [RESOLVED] Increased error rates in Amazon S3
archive.description:
3:26 AM PST We are investigating increased error rates for Amazon S3 in the us-west-1 region.
3:59 AM PST After investigation we determined that there were not increased errors. This was a false alarm. The service is operating normally.

11:43 AM PST We are investigating increased latencies for the EBS APIs and elevated launch failures for EBS backed instances in the US-EAST-1 Region.
12:30 PM PST Between 11:09 AM and 12:04 PM PST EBS APIs experienced elevated latencies in the US-EAST-1 region and there were also elevated launch failures for EBS backed instances. For a portion of that time, a small number of existing EBS volumes briefly experienced increased IO latencies. The service is now operating normally.

archive.summary: [RESOLVED] Failures creating some AWS CloudFormation stacks in the US-EAST-1 region
archive.description:
12:11 PM PST We are investigating failures creating some AWS CloudFormation stacks in the US-EAST-1 region.
12:33 PM PST Between 11:09am and 12:04pm PST we experienced failures creating some AWS CloudFormation stacks in the US-EAST-1 region. The issue is now resolved and the service is operating normally.

archive.summary: [RESOLVED] Failures launching new environments in the US-EAST-1 region
archive.description:
12:12 PM PST We are investigating delays in new environment creation while launching new EC2 instances in the US-EAST-1 region.
12:34 PM PST Between 11:09am and 12:04pm PST we experienced delays in new environment creation in the US-EAST-1 region. The issue is now resolved and the service is operating normally.

4:07 AM PST DNS resolution is impacted for bucket names with virtual hosts (i.e., .s3.amazonaws.com) in the US Standard region. Requests for buckets with virtual names that have already been resolved are being served.
4:40 AM PST Between 2:55AM PST and 4:15AM PST DNS resolution for requests to Amazon S3 buckets in the US-Standard region addressed using bucketname.s3.amazonaws.com failed. Requests addressed using s3.amazonaws.com/bucketname succeeded. The issue has been corrected and DNS resolution is operating normally.

archive.summary: [RESOLVED] Elevated Error Rate in Sao Paulo
archive.description: 1:03 PM PST From 11:05 PST to 11:55 PST the Sao Paulo (GRU1) edge location experienced elevated error rates affecting some object requests. The Service is now operating normally.

7:21 AM PST We are investigating increased errors for requests to our US-West-1 region.
7:39 AM PST From 7:01AM PST to 7:18AM PST requests to the US-WEST-1 region experienced increased error rates. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.

archive.summary: [RESOLVED] Increased API error rates and latencies.
archive.description:
7:22 AM PST We are currently investigating increased error rates and latencies for the EC2 APIs in the US-WEST-1 Region.
7:31 AM PST Between 7:01 AM and 7:18 AM PST, EC2 API requests were failing in the US-WEST-1 region. The issue has been corrected and the service is operating normally.

7:26 AM PST We are investigating increased API error rates in the us-west-1 region.
7:55 AM PST Between 7:01 AM and 7:18 AM PST, some RDS API requests were failing in the US-WEST-1 region. The issue has been corrected and the service is operating normally.

7:27 AM PST We are investigating elevated errors.
7:40 AM PST From 7:01AM PST to 7:18AM PST requests to the US-WEST-1 region experienced increased error rates. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.

7:29 AM PST We are investigating elevated error rates for API calls in the US-WEST-1 region.
7:40 AM PST From 7:01AM PST to 7:18AM PST requests to the US-WEST-1 region experienced increased error rates. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.

archive.summary: [RESOLVED] Increased API error rates and latencies.
archive.description: 7:59 AM PST Between 7:01 AM and 7:18 AM PST, CloudWatch API availability requests were failing in the US-WEST-1 region. Some metrics were delayed during this event. The issue has been corrected and the service is operating normally.

7:20 AM PST We are currently investigating delays in the associations of VPC Elastic IPs in a single availability zone in the US-EAST-1 Region.
7:36 AM PST Between 5:15 AM and 7:16 AM PST a single availability zone in the US-EAST-1 Region experienced delays in VPC Elastic IP associations. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.

7:34 PM PST We are investigating elevated error rates for VPN tunnels on one of our redundant VPN Gateway endpoints in the NRT region.
8:24 PM PST A small number of customers are experiencing elevated packet loss on one of two IPSec VPN tunnels in the AP-NORTHEAST-1 region. The second tunnels are operating normally.
Feb 4, 3:39 AM PST Between 7:17PM PST and 3:03AM PST, a small number of customers experienced elevated packet loss through an IPSec VPN tunnel in the AP-NORTHEAST-1 region. The packet loss has been fixed and the service is operating normally.

4:10 AM PST We are currently investigating increased error rates and latencies for Spot instance related APIs, as well as failures in the fulfillment of new Spot instance requests, in the US-EAST-1 Region.
5:53 AM PST Between 1:40 PM and 05:15 AM PST the fulfillment of Spot instance requests experienced increased failure rates in the US-EAST-1 Region. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.

2:32 PM PST We are seeing increased error rates to CreateDomain, DeleteDomain and ListDomains API calls in SimpleDB in the SA-EAST-1 region. All other API calls are operating normally.
2:42 PM PST We have resolved this issue. The service is operating normally.

archive.summary: [Resolved] Increased Error Rates for ElastiCache APIs
archive.description:
6:03 PM PST We are currently experiencing increased error rates for ElastiCache APIs in the AP-SOUTHEAST-1 Region. Requests to create and manage Cache Clusters and Cache Nodes may fail. We are working to resolve the issue.
6:41 PM PST Between 5:55 PM and 6:27 PM PST, ElastiCache API requests were experiencing increased error rates in the AP-SOUTHEAST-1 region. The issue has been corrected and the service is operating normally.

7:28 PM PST Between 5:53 PM and 06:03 PM PST network connectivity was impaired to instances in the AP-SOUTHEAST-1 Region. Requests to the EC2 APIs also experienced increased error rates. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.

11:50 AM PST We are investigating increased error rates and latencies for the EC2 APIs in the US-WEST-2 Region.
12:38 PM PST Between 11:35 AM and 12:20 PM PST EC2 APIs in the US-WEST-2 Region experienced increased error rates and latencies. A small number of EBS volumes also saw increased IO latencies during this time. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.

11:53 AM PST We are investigating increased errors for requests to our US-WEST-2 region.
12:24 PM PST From 11:35AM PST to 12:12PM PST requests to the US-WEST-2 region experienced a high error rate. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.

12:12 PM PST We are investigating increased error rates for all SNS APIs in US-WEST-2 Region.
12:40 PM PST Between 11:35 AM and 12:12 PM PST APIs in the US-WEST-2 region experienced increased error rates and latencies. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.

12:13 PM PST We are investigating increased error rates for all SQS APIs in US-WEST-2 Region.
12:41 PM PST Between 11:35 AM and 12:12 PM PST APIs in the US-WEST-2 region experienced increased error rates and latencies. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.

12:18 PM PST We are investigating increased error rates and latencies in the US-WEST-2 Region.
12:34 PM PST Between 11:35 AM and 12:12 PM PST RDS APIs in the US-WEST-2 region experienced increased error rates and latencies. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.

12:20 PM PST We are investigating failure rates for CloudWatch APIs and delayed metrics in US-WEST-2.
12:32 PM PST From 11:35 AM PST to 12:20 PM PST, CloudWatch API requests to the US-WEST-2 region experienced a high error rate and metrics were delayed. During this time, CloudWatch alarms set on delayed metrics may have transitioned into an "INSUFFICIENT DATA" state. The issue has been resolved. Both CloudWatch metrics and alarms services are operating normally.
12:43 PM PST Between 11:34am and 12:20pm PST, we experienced increased error rates for the AWS CloudFormation APIs in the US-WEST-2 Region.
12:45 PM PST From 11:35AM PST to 12:20PM PST requests to the US-WEST-2 region experienced a high error rate. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.

current.description:
3:03 PM PST Customer are experiencing elevated packet loss from VPC instances in the Singapore (AP-SOUTHEAST-1) region.
3:04 PM PST From 1:54PM PDT " 2:36PM PDT, customers experienced elevated packet loss from VPC instances in the Singapore (AP-SOUTHEAST-1) region to the Internet and VPN. The packet loss issue has been corrected and the service is now operating normally.
